title: Tsukiyomi-Kun's Forbidden Late-Night Snack
alternative_title: 月読くんの禁断お夜食 ; Tsukuyomi-kun no Kindan Oyashoku ; Mr. Tsukuyomi's Forbidden Midnight Snack
status: 月読くんの禁断お夜食 ; Tsukuyomi-kun no Kindan Oyashoku ; Mr. Tsukuyomi's Forbidden Midnight Snack
description:
Description :
        Soyogi is a personal trainer who has been nicknamed as the "Goddess of Beauty" during the day. However, at night she tends to get lost in the waves of her own negativity... Then, Tsukiyomi-kun, who is great at cooking appears! Having your mind and body healed while being tossed around by a mysterious yet handsome man who has a contract that prohibits romance!? A sweet and forbidden gourmet romantic comedy for two people ☆
